text:
Today’s recommendation for a conditional marketing authorisation for the @pfizer-@BioNTech_Group #vaccine brings us one step closer to defeating the #COVID19 pandemic!

Proud that we supported this great #EU achievement through financing from the @EIB & #H2020 🇪🇺 https://t.co/v5ga7eimD5 https://t.co/RRgciFzPdN
